Module FoundationsF25
Package guiStaff

Class ControllerStaffHome

java.lang.Object
guiStaff.ControllerStaffHome
public class ControllerStaffHome extends Object

Title: ControllerStaffHome Class

Description: This public class supports the actions of guiStaff including quitting, logging out, updating, and feedbackPupUp. In this case, there are 5 methods, 4 of which are called in ViewStaffHome. There is one default constructor, and one attribute which is the database for this class.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static database.Database
    theDatabase
    This is the database connection that ControllerStaffHome uses.

    Description: This method is a default constructor of ControllerStaffHome, but since it has no attributes, it does nothing.

  • Field Details

    • theDatabase

      private static database.Database theDatabase

      This is the database connection that ControllerStaffHome uses. It is the one that the whole application uses.

  • Constructor Details

    • ControllerStaffHome

      public ControllerStaffHome()

      Description: This method is a default constructor of ControllerStaffHome, but since it has no attributes, it does nothing.

  • Method Details

    • feedbackPopUp

      protected static String feedbackPopUp(entityClasses.Post p)

      Method: protected feedbackPopUp(entityClasses.Post p)

      Description: This method is called when a staff member clicks the feedback button in ViewStaffHome. It will create the popUp for the staff to write feedback and call a method to create and save the feedback.

      Parameters:
      p - is the reply that will get feedback.
      Returns:
      the string verification that the feedback pop up was successful

    • createFeedback

      protected static String createFeedback(String text, String staff, String student)

      Method: protected String createFeedback(String text, String staff, String student)

      Description: This method is called when feedbackPopUp has text to create feedback to a post. It creates a feedback object and returns a string when feedback is correctly sent.

      Parameters:
      text - is the content of the feedback.
      staff - is the staff member that is sending the feedback.
      student - is the student that is receiving the feedback.
      Returns:
      string determining if feedback is sent

    • showFeedback

      protected static String showFeedback()

      Method: public String showFeedback()

      Description: This method is called a user clicks the see feedback button. It collects all feedback that this user can view and then shows it in the UI

      Returns:
      the string verification that the feedback is being shown

    • performUpdate

      protected static void performUpdate()

      Method: public performUpdate()

      Description: This method is called when a user clicks account update button. This is called in ViewStaffHome.

    • performLogout

      protected static void performLogout()

      Method: public performLogout()

      Description: This method is called when a user clicks log out button. This is called in ViewStaffHome.

    • performQuit

      protected static void performQuit()

      Method: public performQuit()

      Description: This method is called when a user clicks quit button. This is called in ViewStaffHome.
